properties.description:
Will always be loaded as full.

- For full load without partitioning use:
Parameter tables = ["{'schema': 'CORPORATIVO', 'table':'INSTITUICAO','load_type':'full','partition_column':'null', 'columns': 'COD_INSTITUICAO,NOM_INSTITUICAO,PRINCIPAL_CONTATO,DES_INSTITUICAO,TIPO_INSTITUICAO,SIG_INSTITUICAO,NOM_FANTASIA,NOM_HOME_PAGE,NUM_CNPJ_RADICAL,NUM_CNPJ_FILIAL,NUM_CNPJ_DV,COD_INSTITUICAO_PAI,NOM_CARGO_PRINCIPAL_CONTATO,DAT_COMEMORATIVA,NUM_INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL,COD_CLASSIFICACAO_CNAE,IMG_LOGOMARCA,NUM_EMPREGADO,FL_ATIVAINATIVA'}"]

Execute pipeline = template_import_table_full

ATTENTION: Although this is specified as an object from SCAE, schema is CORPORATIVO

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables
